column17:
Product Description

Herbal Henna is a premium quality 100% natural Henna powder for hair. Since ancient time Henna is known to be effective in preventing premature graying of hair and for hair it nourishes hair papilla and hair pigments that are responsible for hair colour. It is also a good conditioner that not only strengthens the hair roots but also makes hair smooth and shiny. Regular use of herbal Henna naturally conditions hair and gives natural strength and shine to the hair.
